name: coderunnerdemo
description:
CODE:RUNNER  [demo]

You play as a banana. Try to reach the key!

This is my first [!!!!] game [????] prototype made with Inkscape and GB Studio. As of now there isn't much: a few rooms and some secrets. I will later post the assets ( svg, png ) and the gb file!

Use the arrows to move and if it doesn't play click with the mouse on the game.
